dct_description_sm: North oriented toward right of sheet.
Author and imprint taken from atlas.
Title appears within map towards top, above city.
Siege map, showing artillery, troops (labeled formations), ships.
From Ballino's De' disegni delle piu illustri cittae fortezze del mondo, 1569.
